name: Till Death Tattoo Aftercare Balm - 1oz.                 *Free Shipping*
description:
As a Profesional Tattoo Artist and former Licensed Esthetician, I USE and APPROVE this Tattoo Aftercare Balm!

"Vaseline, which is white petroleum, is a NO NO on new tattoos: It’s a heavy, oil based sort of deal that can prevent a new tattoo, which is an open wound, from ‘breathing’ properly. 
What I don’t understand, however, is why so many go on to recommend A&D Ointment which is white petroleum with vitamins A and D added. To put it another way: It’s Vaseline with vitamins. This is the same for Non-fragrance lotions, Neosporin, Bacitracin...they all contain petroleum!"

'TILL DEATH' Tattoo Aftercare is a alternative to petroleum-based jellies and lotions.

Comes in a 1oz. Tin and has a Mint Chocolate scent
100% NATURAL . ORGANIC . HANDMADE 
________________________________________________________
After completion of a new tattoo, remove wrap, gently wash your new tattoo with mild soap and warm water, apply a thin layer of 'TILL DEATH' tattoo aftercare balm to clean hands and gently massage over entire fresh tattoo until balm is no longer visible.

• Repeat 3-4 times a day or as needed to keep your tattoo moist.

• Gently wash your new tattoo with mild soap and warm water before bedtime; lightly pat or air dry and apply a thin layer of 'TILL DEATH' tattoo aftercare balm.

• Avoid unnecessary touching of your new tattoo, do not scrub or scratch it; wear clean and soft clothing; stay away from sun, sauna, steam, swimming pools or tub (do not soak it).
________________________________________________________
*COCOA BUTTER: In order for the body to regrow skin tissue, the skin must be well hydrated. Therefore, cocoa butter's unique ability to lock moisture in at the deeper levels of the skin make it particularly beneficial as a tattoo aftecare treatment.

BEESWAX: Acting as a surfactant, beeswax forms a protective barrier on the surface of the skin that protects it against irritants while still allowing the skin to breathe. 

*COCONUT OIL: Contains lauric acid which gives it anti-microbial, anti-fungal, anti-viral and anti-carcinogenic properties. Coconut oil also has a high saturated fat content so when applied to the skin the fat keeps your skin smooth to the touch and retains the moisture content of the skin. 

*OLIVE OIL: Olive oil works wonders on the skin as a healing agent and, in addition to stretch marks, it can be used on scars, scar tissue, cuts, scrapes, and acne scarring.

*GRAPEFRUIT SEED EXTRACT: Has anti-inflammatory propertiesand is commonly used to speed up the healing of wounds. Non-comedogenic.

*PEPPERMINT EO: Pain Relief, Peppermint oil can be used externally for providing relief from pain. It is believed that the presence of calcium antagonism in peppermint oil aids in removing pain. Relieve skin irritation and itchiness and also helps to reduce skin redness, where inflammation is present.

VITAMIN E OIL: Antioxidant properties absorbed by the epidermis layer of the skin, helps to treat sunburn and aids in wound healing.

* = Organic 

___________________________
*discontinue use if irritation occurs

*This statement has not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

*It is the responsibility of the customer to know of any allergies and/or sensitivity to ANY of the ingredients.

*As always with any medical conditions you should consult you doctor before using herbal products 
 
Shipping is Free!!!
